subject: Help urgent
description_text:
Hi I have got my pedals today and it does not get detected in the pedals
config nor does it get detected in a game? What can i do please help me
asap

conversations.body_text: Hi Arhaam Rahaman,    Please provide your order details. Has your pedal been successfully calibrated? If possible, please share some test videos so we can better assist you in troubleshooting.

Hi So in the simson manager it looks okay, but when i am in any game it is
not working like jumping around so as in the usb controller on windows.

On Wed, 2 Jul 2025 at 6:21 PM, support@simsonn.com

Hi so the simson manager is not overridiing the usb game controllers or
communicating properly to transmit thr input data. Is there any driver or
anything?
